title: Flow Rate Formula
text: Use the formula for volume flow rate: $$Q=A v$$ where Q is the volume flow rate, A is the cross-sectional area, and v is the speed of the flow.

title: Calculate the Cross-Sectional Area
text: The width of the river w is $$60$$ $$m$$, and the depth\n$$d$$ is $$40$$ $$m$$. The cross-sectional area, A, is given by: A $$=$$ w × $$d$$. Calculate A in $$m^2$$.

title: Calculate the Speed of the River
text: Using the formula Q $$=$$ A × v, solve for v: $$v=\frac{Q}{A}=\frac{300}{2400}=$$? in $$\frac{m}{s}$$
